alert.note: Alert for Eastland; Stephens; Young (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 9:09PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Young, Eastland and Stephens Counties through 945 PM CDT... At 908 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Westover to near Hubbard Creek Reservoir to near Baird. Movement was east at 45 mph. Winds associated with thunderstorm outflow will occur prior to the arrival of the thunderstorms. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Graham, Breckenridge, Eastland, Cisco, Olney, Ranger, Rising Star, Hubbard Creek Reservoir, Lake Cisco, Lake Daniel, Gunsight, Lake Graham, Necessity, Lake Olden, Caddo, Crystal Falls, Lake Leon, Palo Pinto Mountains State Park, Possum Kingdom Lake and Newcastle. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 324 and 351. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
